publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4882 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Falkland in Bloom—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Burgh of Falkland for its success in being named best large village and best village overall in the Beautiful Scotland in Bloom awards 2006; further congratulates Falkland for its success in the Britain in Bloom competition in winning a gold award in the best large village category in the Britain in Bloom Award and winning the Community Award for the finalist deemed to have demonstrated that all sectors of the community have worked together as one and Falkland in Bloom Chairman, Keith Jackson, who won a personal commendation for his dedication to the Britain in Bloom cause, and wishes the community of Falkland every success in representing the United Kingdom in the 2007 Entente Florale European Competition.

S2M-4882 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Falkland in Bloom—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Burgh of Falkland for its success in being named best large village and best village overall in the Beautiful Scotland in Bloom awards 2006; further congratulates Falkland for its success in the Britain in Bloom competition in winning a gold award in the best large village category in the Britain in Bloom Award and winning the Community Award for the finalist deemed to have demonstrated that all sectors of the community have worked together as one and Falkland in Bloom Chairman, Keith Jackson, who won a personal commendation for his dedication to the Britain in Bloom cause, and wishes the community of Falkland every success in representing the United Kingdom in the 2007 Entente Florale European Competition.
S2M-4882 Congratulations to Falkland in Bloom (lodged on 27 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*
